remarks: Lemma for ~ dvivth .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2015.)
statement:
dvivth.1 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ( A (,) B ) ) $.

dvivth.5 $e |- ( ph -> M < N ) $.
dvivth.6 $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( ( ( RR _D F ) ` N ) [,] ( ( RR _D F ) ` M ) ) ) $.
dvivth.7 $e |- G = ( y e. ( A (,) B ) |-> ( ( F ` y ) - ( C x. y ) ) ) $.
dvivthlem1 $p |- ( ph -> E. x e. ( M [,] N ) ( ( RR _D F ) ` x ) = C ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
